name: Murder at Mingus Manor
description:
WELCOME TO MINGUS MANOR! You are a detective, tasked with solving a murder at this wacky manor. Five guests, one dead, and a killer amongst them. Can you piece together the clues and interrogate the suspects to find the KILLER?

Made in 5 days for a game jam :)

Genre: Mystery/Time Based/Exploration

NOTE:
the source code below can only be opened with Turbowarp and the following extensions

https://extensions.turbowarp.org/runtime-options.js

https://extensions.turbowarp.org/pointerlock.js

https://extensions.turbowarp.org/utilities.js

https://extensions.turbowarp.org/text.js

https://extensions.turbowarp.org/rixxyx.js
